mapper.select: select s_id, s_date_time, c_id, s_order_total, s_total, s_total_weight, s_freight_price, es_1, es_2, es_3 from sales where s_id = #{sId}
mapper.insert: insert into sales(s_date_time, c_id, s_order_total, s_total, s_total_weight, s_freight_price, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{sDateTime}, #{cId}, #{sOrderTotal}, #{sTotal}, #{sTotalWeight}, #{sFreightPrice}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into sales(s_date_time, c_id, s_order_total, s_total, s_total_weight, s_freight_price, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.sDateTime}, #{entity.cId}, #{entity.sOrderTotal}, #{entity.sTotal}, #{entity.sTotalWeight}, #{entity.sFreightPrice}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into sales(s_date_time, c_id, s_order_total, s_total, s_total_weight, s_freight_price, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.sDateTime}, #{entity.cId}, #{entity.sOrderTotal}, #{entity.sTotal}, #{entity.sTotalWeight}, #{entity.sFreightPrice}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update s_date_time = values(s_date_time), c_id = values(c_id), s_order_total = values(s_order_total), s_total = values(s_total), s_total_weight = values(s_total_weight), s_freight_price = values(s_freight_price), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update sales
s_date_time = #{sDateTime},
c_id = #{cId},
s_order_total = #{sOrderTotal},
s_total = #{sTotal},
s_total_weight = #{sTotalWeight},
s_freight_price = #{sFreightPrice},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where s_id = #{sId}
